document_data.name: Invisible College
document_data.mainbody: The '''Invisible College''' was a place of study for [[djinni]] [[Sorcerer (kit)|sorcerers]] within the [[Citadel of Ice and Steel]].
document_data.Defenses: Layer upon layer of illusions were constantly changing within and around the College, leading most sages to agree that it did not really exist.
document_data.Inhabitants: The vast majority of djinni sorcerers, along with their bound [[deceiver genie]]s, called the Invisible College home.
